title: Russia, India and China have tendency to interact in common interests: Lavrov

Security has been tightened around the shrine as investigations continue into the vandalism.

description: A large-scale immigration raid at a Hyundai-LG battery plant in Georgia led to the detention of hundreds, including over 300 South Korean workers, sparking diplomatic concerns and scrutiny of visa practices. The operation, targeting unlawful employment, halted construction at the multibillion-dollar EV battery project.

Expectations are high for Evans, who aims to continue his streak of 1,000-yard seasons.

The IPO includes a fresh issue of shares and an offer for sale by promoters Alakh Pandey and Prateek Boob. The funds will be used for physical infrastructure, technology, marketing, and investments in subsidiaries, aiming to fuel expansion and growth initiatives.

Revised job reports reveal a hiring slowdown, adding to concerns about rising inflation and eroding consumer purchasing power.

Rain fury: Floods rip into Punjab's dwindling green cover, 5 lakh trees uprooted
description: Devastating floods in Punjab have significantly hampered efforts to expand the state's diminishing green cover, resulting in the loss of 4,94,956 trees across 776 hectares. With forest cover already low at 3.7% of its geographical area, the floods have deepened Punjab's ecological stress and caused an estimated damage of over Rs 360.5 lakh to the forest and wildlife preservation department.

title: Manipur pact: Kuki groups warn against 'free passage' after NH-2 reopening
description: The reopening of National Highway-2, a vital supply route, has stirred unease in Manipur's peace process. Kuki-Zo armed groups, KNO and UPF, cautioned against interpreting it as acceptance of unrestricted movement between communities. This follows a renewed ceasefire agreement with the Centre, focusing on territorial integrity and a political solution.

title: 'Slapped 50–60 times': Classmates assault UP law student inside private university
description: In Lucknow's Chinhat, a law student was allegedly assaulted and threatened by a group of fellow students inside his university campus. The victim, Shikhar, was attacked in a car, enduring physical abuse and intimidation. An FIR has been lodged, and police are investigating the incident, which has left the student traumatized and fearing for his safety.

title: 'The Summer I Turned Pretty': Lauren Kyle shares her take on the movie
description: Lauren Kyle, wife of Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid, gave fans a glimpse into her evening with an Instagram Story about The Summer I Turned Pretty. The post comes just months after McDavid’s run to the 2025 Stanley Cup Finals and Kyle’s June launch of Bar Trove in Edmonton. The couple’s public support for each other continues to stand out.

title: Nepal social media ban: Facebook, Twitter among 26 apps blocked; Govt explains why
description: Nepal has banned major social media platforms like Facebook, YouTube, and X after they failed to register with the government by the given deadline. This decision follows a Supreme Court directive to regulate online platforms and monitor content.

title: Aryna Sabalenka’s new boyfriend: Who is Georgios Frangulis?
description: Aryna Sabalenka found solace and support in Brazilian entrepreneur Georgios Frangulis following the tragic loss of her ex-boyfriend. Their relationship became public in spring 2024, with Frangulis becoming a constant presence in her player's box. Beyond his support, Frangulis is the founder of Oakberry, an açaí-based brand for which Sabalenka is an ambassador.
